author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This is allows track isolation with L1 tracks to be produced for electrons for the E/g Phase-II HLT

#### PR validation:

Tested in phase-II workflows

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32594
title: E/gamma HLT L1 Track Isolation Producer & TTTrack typedef: 11_1_X
